document.full_text: yahoo inc has resolved a dispute with alibaba group over the chinese company's transfer of its online payment system, alipay, to chief executive jack ma, two sources close to the matter said.
document.title: exclusive: yahoo, alibaba reach deal over alipay: sources
lines_and_colors: yahoo inc has resolved a dispute with alibaba group over the chinese company's transfer of its online payment system, alipay, to chief executive jack ma, two sources close to the matter said.
